cui_name: BRONCHIECTASIS WITH OR WITHOUT ELEVATED SWEAT CHLORIDE 1
reasoning: CFTR-related bronchiectasis with elevated sweat chloride. Incidence based on cystic fibrosis epidemiology (~1 per 3,000 live births globally), translating to ~0.53 per 100k person-years. Confidence moderate due to specific genetic variant designation limiting direct epidemiological data.
